data.current_summary: Creates one or more test card ranges.
data.current_description: Creates one or more test card ranges.
data.summary_suggestion: Generate custom test card ranges for payment testing
data.description_suggestion: Creates one or more custom test card ranges for payment testing purposes. Accepts a request containing card range specifications (brand, card type, currency, and other parameters). Returns a result containing the created test card ranges with their details including card numbers, expiration dates, and associated metadata. These generated test cards can be used for testing payment flows in the Adyen sandbox environment without affecting production systems.
